caller_intent: The caller (Susan and Terry White) wanted to resolve a discrepancy where they received a notice of an additional $52.71 charge on their auto policy, despite being told by another party that their account was paid in full.
resolution_steps: Agent requested the caller's name, policy number, and contact information to verify the account.
Agent checked the policy details and identified the charge as a company error.
Agent informed the caller the charge would be waived and instructed them to disregard the notice.
Agent offered additional contact methods (portal and texting) for future reference.
knowledge_required: Policy verification and billing error identification
Customer portal and contact method familiarity
summary: A customer disputed an unexpected auto policy charge, which the agent resolved by identifying it as a company error and waiving the fee. The agent also provided digital support options to the caller.
